summary: This document is a technical notice from T-Mobile's Law Enforcement Relations Group explaining how call detail records are timestamped, primarily in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), and providing conversion resources for law enforcement. It appears to be a standard procedural document related to records production in investigations.

locations.context: Address of T-Mobile's Law Enforcement Relations Group

keyFacts: T-Mobile stores call detail records in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for recent records and in user location time zones for older records.
The document provides technical guidance for law enforcement to interpret and convert timestamps from T-Mobile records.
It is a standard notice, not case-specific, indicating it was likely produced in response to a legal demand for records in an investigation.
